text: Miranda Jane Richardson (born 3 March 1958) is an English actress. She first appeared as Ruth Ellis in Dance with a Stranger (1985) and went on to receive Academy Award nominations for Damage (1992) and Tom & Viv (1994). ==References== Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:English television actors Category:Entertainers from Merseyside
title: Miranda Richardson
